## Bcp47.LanguageSpec type

Any of the possible ways to represent a language - as a `string`<!-- -->, parsed [subtags](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.subtags.md) or an instantiated [language tag](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagetag.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type LanguageSpec = string | ISubtags | LanguageTag;
```
**References:** [ISubtags](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.isubtags.md)<!-- -->, [LanguageTag](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagetag.md)
